name: Peaceful Night
description:
Peaceful Night

Wally gets out of the city for what will surely be a peaceful night in the tranquility of nature. Help Wally relax for as long as possible.

Created for week-long game jam Brackeys 2021-2 "Let there be Chaos"

Art 

- Retro Lines by VEXED

- Pixel Night City by FridaRuiz

Font

- Kenpixel by Kenney

Sound 

- Boss-a-Nova by Matthew Klingensmith

- Jump by Wowsoudnsg

- Damage Sound by GameMasterAudio
